title: [광고] 워더미 겨울 도톰 배색라인 골지 중목 양말 7켤레 세트 W847

product_info.description: 워더미 겨울 도톰 배색라인 골지 중목 양말 7켤레 세트 W847 - 패션잡화

scenes.sora_prompt: Vertical 9:16 format, portrait orientation, cinematic product hero shot with human element, camera starts slightly blurred then racks focus sharply onto Korean person's hands holding colorful striped ribbed mid-calf winter socks set, Korean person's hands centered in vertical frame examining seven pairs of thick textured socks with East Asian skin tone visible, premium knitted fabric with bold contrasting color lines running along each sock, same Korean person throughout entire video wearing cozy indoor winter loungewear, hands gently spreading socks to display vibrant color variety and thick cushioned texture, dramatic soft lighting with subtle shadows creating depth on fabric texture, slow push-in on hands and product revealing intricate ribbed knit pattern and striped details, establishing the main Korean character who will appear in all following scenes, desirable and eye-catching mood, shot on 35mm film with anamorphic bokeh, shallow depth gradually deepening to reveal warm cozy living room backdrop with winter atmosphere, warm neutral tones with vibrant sock colors popping against soft background, consistent Korean character and location established from the start, camera movement leads viewer's eye naturally as hands lower preparing for transition to wider lifestyle context
scenes.narration: 겨울마다 차가운 발로 고생하셨나요? 이제 7가지 컬러로 매일 다른 기분을 느껴보세요
scenes.character_consistency: Korean person in cozy indoor winter wear, East Asian features
scenes.location_consistency: Warm living room with winter atmosphere

scenes.sora_prompt: Vertical 9:16 format, portrait orientation, cinematic lifestyle problem scene, camera transitions from previous hands shot by pulling back to reveal full upper body of the SAME KOREAN PERSON from Scene 0 with East Asian features clearly visible sitting on living room floor struggling with thin worn-out socks, same cozy indoor winter loungewear visible confirming character continuity, same Korean person now shown from waist up in vertical frame removing disappointing thin socks with holes, Korean face with East Asian facial features showing uncomfortable expression rubbing cold feet, shivering slightly with body language conveying discomfort, same warm living room location established in Scene 0 now visible in wider shot, lighting gradually shifts from product focus to cold uncomfortable reality with cooler tones, slow tracking sideways with same Korean person revealing pile of old worn socks nearby, maintaining Korean character and environmental consistency, relatable and empathetic mood building connection, shot on 35mm film maintaining visual continuity from previous scene, depth of field opens up showing same living room backdrop with winter window visible, desaturated cooler color palette contrasting with previous product warmth, same Korean person looks down at their cold feet searching for solution as camera slowly drifts toward where better product will appear
scenes.narration: 얇은 양말로 겨울을 버티다 보면 발이 시려서 집중도 안 되고 밤에 잠도 설쳤죠. 세탁할 때마다 늘어나고 보풀 생기는 양말들, 매일 아침 신을 양말 고르기도 스트레스였나요?

scenes.sora_prompt: Vertical 9:16 format, portrait orientation, cinematic product solution reveal, camera continues previous movement as the SAME KOREAN PERSON from previous scenes now puts on the NEW thick colorful striped ribbed socks with Korean hands clearly visible examining the cushioned texture, same loungewear confirming character continuity, same warm living room location, seamless transition as same Korean person's hands with East Asian skin tone come into frame pulling up one pair of vibrant striped socks showing premium fabric quality, close-up of Korean hands feeling thick cushioned sole and elastic ribbed texture, feet now comfortably warm in new socks with satisfied body language, same vertical framing maintaining Korean character consistency, lighting transforms from cold problem atmosphere to warm satisfied solution with natural golden indoor light highlighting sock colors, camera orbits 180 degrees around same Korean person's legs and feet revealing seven different color combinations of striped socks laid out nearby, convincing and satisfying mood as solution unfolds on same Korean person, shot on 35mm film with consistent bokeh character, same Korean person's satisfied expression with East Asian features gradually visible as camera pulls slightly back, vibrant yet natural color palette with each sock pair's contrasting stripes clearly visible, camera movement mirrors same Korean person's foot movement building tactile connection, same living room backdrop visible confirming location continuity, preparing for final emotional payoff with same Korean character
scenes.narration: 워더미 도톰 배색라인 골지 양말은 두껍고 푹신한 쿠션감으로 발을 따뜻하게 감싸줘요. 골지 디자인으로 늘어나지 않고 오래 신을 수 있죠. 7가지 컬러로 매일 다른 스타일을 즐길 수 있어요
